Restricted  
NO.CAS-8(4)/2009/DIV.I(Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated :  04 /01/2012 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO.  01  /2012 
 
 
Subject: Facility of Access to tarmac on his own vehicle by His  
                Holiness Jagadguru Sankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand  
               Saraswati of Dwarka/Sharda Peeth at airports on Medical  
               Grounds.  
 
 
 
                In continuation to this Bureau Circular No.12/2010 dated 26/05/2010, His 
Holiness Shri Jagat Guru Shankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand Saraswati  of 
Dwarka/Sharda peeth alongwith his ADC (G.R.Mishra) or a private security is 
permitted to avail the access of his vehicle up to the tarmac, on medical ground, during 
his departure/arrival by air at all airports in the country for a period of six months w.e.f 
28.12.2011.  
 
 
 
( Raja Srivastava, IPS) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached / overleaf. 
 
Copy to :- 
 
1. 
MCA ( Shri Ashok Kumar, Under Secretary), Rajiv Gandhi Bhawan,  
            New Delhi      : w.r.t  MCA letter No.AV.13024/39/2007-SS dated  
                                      28/12/2011 ( Fax No: 24619226)

                                          ( FAX: 0712-2764809 )
